mapper.select: select * from question order by substring(question_code from 7 for 3)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (question_code, question_title, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, correct, state, correct_rate, picture) VALUES(#{questionCode}, #{questionTitle}, #{choice1}, #{choice2}, #{choice3}, #{choice4}, #{correct}, #{state}, #{correctRate}, #{picture})
